backend/main.mo: Defines an actor storing uploaded project files and CV URLs with functions to add and query them.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration converting old project and resume maps into the new uploadedFiles and uploadedCVs structures.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables, typography, and utility classes for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component switching between landing and case‑study views with smooth‑scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactLink: Renders email, resume, and LinkedIn buttons using contact JSON and ResumeCta.
frontend/src/components/site/Motion.tsx: RevealOnScroll component animating elements into view using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion support.
Provides Section and Container layout components with consistent spacing and max‑width.
frontend/src/components/site/ResumeCta.t: Resume button that checks asset availability and disables itself if the PDF is missing.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section showing bio content with scroll‑reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Hero section with headline, description, CTAs, and background imagery using siteContent JSON.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Le: Contact section with intro text and action links wrapped in scroll‑reveal.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Renders project list as interactive cards that navigate to case studies with animated reveal.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Va: Renders a value‑propositions section using siteContent.json, displaying a heading and a grid of items with scroll‑reveal animations.
Footer displaying copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
Sticky header providing smooth‑scroll navigation and resume/LinkedIn actions.
frontend/src/content/assets.json: Defines static asset metadata for the site, currently including a resume PDF with its path and labels.
frontend/src/content/caseStudies.json: Contains structured case‑study data including slugs, titles, clients, images, and section content for detailed project pages.
frontend/src/content/contact.json: Provides basic contact information such as email and LinkedIn URL.
frontend/src/content/projects.json: Lists high‑level project summaries with slugs, titles, client info, descriptions, and thumbnails.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.json: Holds site‑wide content such as hero text, value proposition items, and about information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state management, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Checks the user's reduced‑motion preference via a media query and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Checks if a static asset exists by issuing a HEAD request and returns availability status.
frontend/src/index.css: Re‑imports the root index.css file for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudyPage.tsx: Displays a full case‑study page with images, sections, and navigation, pulling structured data from caseStudies.json.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the homepage layout with hero, value props, work samples, about, and contact sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, content paths, and extensive theme extensions for colors, typography, spacing, radii, and shadows with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing goals, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of existing features with versioned requirements for the portfolio site.
